mnd1:9.4: na hehisī”ti → na hehisi (s2, s3) | na hohisīti (pts1, c1)
mnd1:13.3: jāgu → jagu (si, mr) | jātu (s1-3) | jagū (pts1), indagu → indagū (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mnd1:20.3: Atha antena jahati → atho antena jahati (s1-3) | asahantena dahati (mr)
mnd1:30.8: supatīti → sappatīti (mr), sarīsapo → siriṃsapo (bj, pts1) | sirisapo (s1-3)
mnd1:31.4: paligedho → paḷigedho (bj), āyūhinī → āyūhanī (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mnd1:51.5: mahiṃsā → gomahisā (bj, s1-3, pts1), ahī vicchikā → ahi vicchikā (s1-3) | ahivicchikā (pts1, c1), rakhasā → rakkhasā (mr)
mnd1:84.4: Neva saṃsibbati → neva sineti (bj) | neva visīneti (s1-3) | neva visineti (pts1)
mnd1:84.15: atammayatāya → akammassakatāya (si) | akammaññatāya (s1-3, pts1) | akammayatāya (c1), bhavapariyante ṭhito, saṃsārapariyante ṭhito vaṭṭapariyante ṭhito, antime bhave ṭhito →  etthantare pāṭho sī potthake
